text: Daniel Kwan () and Daniel Scheinert, known collectively as Daniels, are American movie directors and screenwriters. They are known for directing the science-fiction movie Everything Everywhere All at Once (2022). For this movie, the Daniels won the Academy Awards for Best Picture, Best Director and Best Original Screenplay. ==References== Category:Movie directors from Massachusetts Category:Screenwriters from Massachusetts Category:Writers from Birmingham, Alabama Category:Duos Category:Academy Award winning directors Category:Academy Award winning writers
title: Daniels (directors)
